articles.content:

articles.description: Drive-Away Dolls isn’t quite a Coen Brothers’ movie, but it is written and directed by Ethan Coen, and its first trailer looks great.

articles.title: Ice Spice and Nicki Minaj remade ‘Barbie Girl’ for the Barbie movie
articles.description: The new song samples Aqua’s original hit with a music video much like the 1997 version. It’s also an ironic end to what was initially a prolonged legal battle.
articles.content: Youd never guess how much this song has been through

articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: 盘点 2019 年消失的明星创业公司 | TechCrunch 中文版
articles.description:
创业公司会因为各种原因而失败，但有一点不会改变：创业是极其困难的事。想要创办一家成功的公司，需要的不仅仅是热情，以及找到合适的人才（尽管很明显这两点很重要）。成功的创业者需要在许许多多细节上做到完美。

粗略地回顾下今年的创业公司，可以发现并没有什么公司能带来像去年Theranos那样的轰动性故事。Theranos的故事被写成了畅销书，改编成了纪录片，相关电影也即将上映。不过某些公司，例如MoviePass，可能已经逐渐接近。

通常来说，每看到一家Theranos，我们同时也会看到数十位辛勤创业者的故事…
articles.content:
